charges.charge_description: Did knowingly &; intentionally possess w/intent to distribute less than (50) kilograms of marijuana. 21:841(a)(1), 941(b)(1)(D) Offense Date: 3/9/03 PENALTY: Not more than 5 yrs. imprisonment, a fine of up to $250,000, at least 2 yrs. SRT, a $100 special assessment and community restitution up to the amount of any fine imposed by the court. (1)

Did knowingly &; intentionally conspire to possess w/intent to distribute less than 50 kilograms of marijuana. 21:846, 841(a)(1), 841(b)(1)(D) Offense Date: From on or about Jan. 2003 to on or about March 9, 2003. PENALTY: Not more than 5 yrs. imprisonment, a fine of up to $250,000, at least 2 yrs. SRT, a $100 special assessment. (2)
Possess with Intent to Distribute Less than 50 kilograms of Marijuana and comspire with others to Distribute Less than 50 kilograms of Marijuana, Title 21, USC 841, 846. [2:03-m-81]

Did knowingly &; intentionally possess w/intent to distribute less than (50) kilograms of marijuana. 21:841(a)(1), 941(b)(1)(D) Offense Date: 3/9/03 PENALTY: Not more than 5 yrs. imprisonment, a fine of up to $250,000, at least 2 yrs. SRT, a $100 special assessment and community restitution up to the amount of any fine imposed by the court. (1)

Did knowingly &; intentionally conspire to possess w/intent to distribute less than 50 kilograms of marijuana. 21:846, 841(a)(1), 841(b)(1)(D) Offense Date: From on or about Jan. 2003 to on or about March 9, 2003. PENALTY: Not more than 5 yrs. imprisonment, a fine of up to $250,000, at least 2 yrs. SRT, a $100 special assessment. (2)
Possess with Intent to Distribute Less than 50 kilograms of Marijuana and comspire with others to Distribute Less than 50 kilograms of Marijuana, Title 21, USC 841, 846. [2:03-m-81]
